children.text: The window and door frames have not yet been installed, and are currently being stored directly on the ground, in direct contact with water/damp conditions, which will almost certainly damage or stain them.
The relevant Australian Standard, AS 2047 - Windows and external glazed doors states in the On-Site Care section, that
'Windows should be stored on site in a clean, dry area' .
The builder should immediately move these window and door frames out of contact with moisture, and make arrangements to repair or replace any areas that are damaged.
